inks.name: Tsuki-yo
inks.description: Deep blue-black, like the moonlit night
inks.details: Tsuki-yo (月夜) captures the deep blue of a moonlit night sky. This sophisticated ink offers subtle shading and excellent flow, making it perfect for both daily writing and special occasions.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Brilliant Black
inks.description: Classic black ink with reliable performance
inks.details: Pelikan 4001 Brilliant Black is a time-tested ink known for its consistent performance and reliability. It dries relatively quickly and works well in all fountain pens.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens, especially German pens

inks.name: Kon-peki
inks.description: Deep cerulean blue, like the deep ocean
inks.details: Kon-peki (紺碧) is a vibrant, saturated cerulean blue that represents the deep ocean. It's one of the most popular inks in the Iroshizuku line, known for its beautiful shading and excellent behavior in all pens.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Yama-dori
inks.details: Yama-dori (山鳥) is a stunning teal ink that exhibits a dramatic red sheen when laid down heavily. It offers excellent shading and flow, making it a favorite among ink enthusiasts for its unique color characteristics.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Oxford Blue
inks.details: Oxford Blue is a sophisticated dark blue that's suitable for professional use. It offers subtle shading and good flow characteristics, making it an excellent choice for daily writing.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Shin-ryoku
inks.details: Shin-ryoku (深緑) is a vibrant, fresh green that evokes the color of new leaves in spring. It offers excellent shading and smooth flow, making it perfect for adding color to your writing.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Serenity Blue
inks.details: Serenity Blue (formerly known as Florida Blue) is one of the most recommended inks for fountain pen users. It's safe, well-behaved, and offers excellent performance across all pen types.
inks.compatibility: Extremely safe and well-behaved with all fountain pens

inks.name: Apricot
inks.details: Apricot is a warm, inviting orange ink that brings energy to your writing. It offers good shading and smooth flow, perfect for personal notes and creative writing.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Irish Green
inks.description: Rich, vibrant green with excellent shading
inks.details: Irish Green is a rich, vibrant green that captures the essence of the Irish countryside. It offers excellent shading and smooth flow, making it a favorite among green ink enthusiasts.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Ancient Copper
inks.details: Ancient Copper is a unique brown-orange ink that exhibits dramatic shading. It's one of Diamine's most popular inks, known for its warm tones and excellent performance.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens

inks.name: Asa-gao
inks.description: Morning glory blue, bright and cheerful
inks.details: Asa-gao (朝顔) is a bright, vibrant blue inspired by the morning glory flower. It offers excellent shading and smooth flow, making it perfect for daily writing with a pop of color.
inks.compatibility: Works excellently with all fountain pens

inks.name: Blue
inks.details: Lamy Blue is a standard, reliable blue ink that comes in cartridges and bottles. It's well-behaved, safe for all pens, and offers consistent performance.
inks.compatibility: Works well with all fountain pens
